pages.text: $(item)Hoppers/$ have been removed, as they have been replaced almost entirely by content from $(concept)Create/$ in ways which require more design effort than $(item)Hoppers/$. In most cases a $(item)Chute/$ is capable of replacing vanilla $(item)Hoppers/$, while $(item)Deployers/$ or other more complex automated systems can fulfil the rest of use cases for $(item)Hoppers/$.
